price: Kuma ambaci Ibrãhĩm* a cikin Littafi. Lalle shi ya kasance mai yawan gaskatãwa, Annabi.
arabic: وَٱذۡكُرۡ فِي ٱلۡكِتَٰبِ إِبۡرَٰهِيمَۚ إِنَّهُۥ كَانَ صِدِّيقٗا نَّبِيًّا
footnotes: * Ibrãhĩm ya yi ƙõƙarin shiryar da ubansa, sai dai Allah bainufi shiryuwarsa ba. Daga cikin amfãnin haihuwa akwai abin haihuwa ya shiryar da mahaifinsa, ya yi masa nasĩha gwargwadon hãli.

version.title: Hausa language - Abu Bakr Jomy
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Hausa by Abu Bakr Mahmoud Jomy. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.
